name: Best Maps for Minecraft - Download Mine Maps for Pocket Edition
name_original: Best Maps for Minecraft - Download Mine Maps for Pocket Edition
description:
Have you ever wanted custom maps for your Minecraft Pocket Edition game?!?!?! 

DOWNLOAD & FIND & EXPLORE the absolute BEST Minecraft PE Maps available right now! Browse through tons of the best maps available for PE. With this app you are ensured to get the very best of MCPE Maps built by the Best MCPE builders! 

Best Features:
1. A lot of Maps
2. High resolution screenshots and detailed descriptions
3 Compatible with iPhone,iPod and iPad
4. Search using your favorite keywords
5-Easy installation tutorial .
6. And Much More

This app lets you have those custom maps!!! 
We add new maps regularly and have guides on the app on how to install maps onto your Minecraft PE app!
